name: Blockbuster (PumpkinDE)
description:
A small Breakout remake with a trick.

Gameplay:

If the red or green blocks are not caught, they distort the camera in a different way.

So try to keep the balance by picking up or dodging blocks.

Controls:

Move the mouse to move the your block.

Press "M" to toggle music

Music by David "Uranoxyd" Ewelt

Implemented by Stefan Laufer
